articles.description: Sporting a 'thrilling' bespoke outfit designed with Nike, the athlete donned a glittering bridal-style train, gold shoe tags and diamonds in her hair as she arrived on court for her first round match.
articles.content: Serena Williams showed she's determined to exit her glittering sporting career in style - in both the tennis and fashion stakes - waltzed on court at Arthur Ashe Stadium looking like a rock star, and… [+6882 chars]
